column5: I use crystal fireline or power pro on my baitcasters and spinning rods...do I really need fluor leaders???? I have done fly-ins before and usually don't use leaders???? Opinions accepted guys....tanin colored lake where we are going...and fishing is fantastic...walleye mainly occassional northern
Fluoro is unncessary in those waters.  Save your money for Beer! Tony
AMEN Tony...sounds like a plan....maybe splurge and get some spicey V-8 and have a spicey red beer!!

I never use a leader on my main rod for walleyes when on fly in but I do keep a bigger rod with me geared up for pike with a wire leader when I feel like throwing for them. Like was said with the stained water it isn't going to make a big difference.
